headline: 3 Dirt-Cheap Value Stocks to Invest $1,000 in This July
summary: NextEra Energy is a leading utility stock that has fallen out of favor due to the passage of the "One Big Beautiful Bill."  United Airlines' low valuation really is a buying opportunity.  Lockheed Martin is a stable stalwart that can afford to grow its dividend for decades to come.
